scripts.test-dijkstra: tsx -e "import { findPathDijkstra } from './src/dijkstra'; console.log('Dijkstra算法测试');"
scripts.test-astar: tsx -e "import { findPathHeap } from './src/astar_heap'; console.log('A*算法测试');"
scripts.test-jps: tsx -e "import { findPathJPS } from './src/astar_jps'; console.log('JPS算法测试');"
scripts.test-bfs: tsx -e "import { findPathBFS } from './src/bfs'; console.log('BFS算法测试');"
scripts.test-dfs: tsx -e "import { findPathDFS } from './src/dfs'; console.log('DFS算法测试');"
scripts.test-gbfs: tsx -e "import { findPathGBFS } from './src/gbfs'; console.log('GBFS算法测试');"
scripts.test-bidirectional: tsx -e "import { findPathBidirectional } from './src/bidirectional-search'; console.log('双向搜索算法测试');"
scripts.docs-pathfinding: echo '路径查找算法文档:' && echo '1. 详细对比分析: Pathfinding-Algorithms-Comparison.md' && echo '2. 快速参考: Pathfinding-Quick-Reference.md' && echo '3. 决策指南: Pathfinding-Decision-Guide.md' && echo '4. 使用说明: README-Pathfinding.md'
